skins.selfIntroduction: I am the name ship of Project 68-K, also known as the Chapayev-class. I was meant to participate in the war, but due to a series of delays, I was not completed in time. I didn't really do anything. Too bad. Hehehe.
skins.acquisition: So you're the Commander? Hehe, I like what I see... Ah, excuse me. I'm Chapayev, a light cruiser from the Northern Parliament. Let's get along~
skins.login: Welcome, Commander. So this is your office...? Aha, of course, it's OUR office, isn't it?
skins.details: Commander, let's chat a bit? It's important that we get to know each other... don't you think?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you jealous of my little friend here, Commander...? Oh, you're not? Hmm.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm actually very strong... Or at least, I was designed to be. I guess I would need you to check and make sure I actually turned out that way, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you're worried those you trust will betray you, you just have to keep them close. Either rope or chains will do the trick... right?
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to feel? Ah, not this little guy. I mean me. Hehehe.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, what's going on? Did I... do something wrong...? This was all just... meant to be an exercise, right?
skins.acquisition: Commander, what's going on? Did I... do something wrong...? This was all just... meant to be an exercise, right?
skins.login: *Pant*... *pant*... Commander, what should we start with today?
skins.details: I could leave whenever I want, so why do I stay... Commander? N- nothing, it's nothing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You know, this room might rub some people the wrong way...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are you okay? Please answer me if you're okay. You can't keep me waiting...
skins.secretaryIdle3: If I'm here too long, you know Tashkent will start to worry...
skins.secretaryTouch: I- I have to keep this around my neck?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hyah?! Commander, that's not what I meant...!
